page.title: 15Visit to Hewitts Farm.
page.content: On Tuesday we went to visit {Hewitts Farm}.To get there we had to walk along the busy {Orpington By-Pass} until we reached the farm gates. Hewitts Farm is a{"Pick Your Own"} fruit and vegetable produce farm.There are many different fields on the farm and to reach them you can ride on a special bus which will take you all around.The summer time is the busiest time of year for Hewitts when they employ 30 people at the week ends and 20 during the week.In winter there is not much work because it is often much too wet or cold. One of the main crops grown at Hewitts are {strawberries} which are planted at different times so that they do not all ripen at the same time.This year they have got so much fruit they have had to sell some of it at the markets in London.
